job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer - Data Science Innovation and Generative AI

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes leading the ideation, design, and deployment of innovative solutions in data science and generative AI, developing functionalities for Data Science platforms, and exploring new AWS services. It also mentions building and maintaining code libraries with best practices, automating security checks, and building CI/CD pipelines. While it mentions data science, the core focus is on generative AI and building/deploying solutions around it, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's emphasis on developing and deploying applications built on generative models and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'innovative solutions in data science and generative AI' implies the development and application of models, and 'developing creative and forward-thinking functionalities for Data Science platforms' suggests building models for specific platform features.
job_tasks.phrase: innovative solutions in data science and generative AI

job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to creating and implementing new features within data science platforms, which often involves model development or adaptation.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop creative and forward-thinking functionalities for Data Science platforms

job_tasks.justification: Optimizing code efficiency and investigating novel, high-speed solutions are core software engineering tasks aimed at improving performance.
job_tasks.phrase: Optimize code efficiency and investigate novel, high-speed solutions

job_tasks.justification: Driving innovation in data science technologies implies exploring and implementing new modeling approaches and techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive innovation in data science technologies

job_tasks.justification: Exploring new AWS services and optimizing product performance through experimentation and testing involves software development and integration within a cloud environment.
job_tasks.phrase: Explore new AWS services and optimize product performance through experimentation and testing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Mentor and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge' directly speaks to communication and knowledge sharing.
job_tasks.phrase: Mentor and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge

job_tasks.justification: Providing expertise in building and maintaining a code library, emphasizing best practices and innovation, is a software development task focused on code quality and maintainability.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide expertise in building and maintaining a code library, emphasizing best practices and innovation

job_tasks.justification: Automating security checks and building robust CI/CD pipelines are key components of MLOps and software development for reliable deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: Automate security checks and build robust CI/CD pipelines

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating on the development of AWS SDK solutions involves building software components that interact with cloud services.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on the development of AWS SDK solutions

job_tasks.justification: The team's aim to help PostNL make great strides by innovating in data science and AI, and the ambition to be the favorite logistics company, shows alignment with business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: help PostNL make great strides by innovating in the domain of data science and AI

soft_skills.phrase: passion for learning and sharing knowledge
part of the PostNL engineering community in which we share "best practices" and innovations
Lead the ideation, design, and deployment of innovative solutions
Drive innovation in data science technologies
